ygData.subject: RE: A trade skill question for the gallery.
ygData.msgSnippet: Cured silk requires a decent brewing skill (70 I ve heard) for the Heady Kiola to be self sufficient. It can, of course, be bought from felow brewers... Good
ygData.messageBody:
Cured silk requires a decent brewing skill (70 I've heard) for the Heady
Kiola to be self sufficient. It can, of course, be bought from felow
brewers...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Katy Westerman [mailto:katyw@...]
8)Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 2:26 PM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: [eqbards] A trade skill question for the gallery.
8)
8)

8)

8)I have recently begun working on my trade skills (tailoring, brewing,
8)and smithing...I'm a bard, I should trade like one!) and have a
8)question about the new cured silk. Is the triviality level the same
8)as raw silk/patchwork or is this something new to use instead of the
8)platinum eating studded armor?
8)
8)I know this is off topic, but this is the only place I have access to
8)ask at right now.
8)
8)Robynn, 19th measure, E'ci
